wikitext.*:
'''YAN''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "vast, huge"; YAN and '''YAD''' are also given the signification "wide". The root also appears in the forms YANA, YĂN.<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 42 (root appearing as "√YANA-"), 99, 115 (roots appearing as "YAN-, YAD"), 191 (roots appearing as "√YAN-" and "√YANA-; YĂN")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''yāna, yanda''<ref name=PE17/>
*[[Sindarin]]: ''iaun'' ("roomy, wide, extensive"); [[-nd|''-iann'', ''-ion'']]; ''iand''<ref name=PE17/>

==Other versions of the legendarium==

In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the root DẎṆTṆ, with the [[Qenya]] derivative ''yanta-'' ("enlarge, increase, add to").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref>
